SEARCH
Package display.medicalRecords

Class PrescriptionDisplay

java.lang.Object
display.medicalRecords.PrescriptionDisplay
public class PrescriptionDisplay extends Object
The PrescriptionDisplay class provides display methods for managing prescriptions, including updating and adding new prescriptions for a patient. It interacts with various managers to retrieve and update prescription and medication information.

  • Method Details

    • updatePrescriptionDisplay

      public static void updatePrescriptionDisplay(Patient patient, Doctor doctor, String diagnosisId) throws PageBackException
      Displays the menu to update an existing prescription for a patient's diagnosis. Shows the current prescription details, allows the user to add medications, and update drug instructions.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient associated with the prescription
      doctor - the doctor updating the prescription
      diagnosisId - the ID of the diagnosis associated with the prescription
      Throws:
      PageBackException - if the diagnosis is not found or another error occurs

    • displayAddNewPresciption

      public static void displayAddNewPresciption(Patient patient, Doctor doctor, String prescriptionID) throws PageBackException
      Displays the menu to add a new prescription for a diagnosis. Prompts the user to select medications and enter drug instructions, and then creates a new prescription associated with the specified patient and doctor.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient for whom the prescription is being created
      doctor - the doctor creating the prescription
      prescriptionID - the unique ID for the new prescription
      Throws:
      PageBackException - if an error occurs while creating the prescription
